name: Ret:Roller 443
description:
My submission for Brackey's 2020 REWIND GameJam.  

A simple point and click skill/reflex game with the goal of rewinding an audio cassette tape.  Click on Pencils to rewind the cassette but avoid clicking Scissors or you will damage the cassette.  Too much damage and it's game over. However if you can click at least 2 Digital Clocks you will be able to hold down the right mouse button to rewind TIME....at least a bit.

Beat each level to unlock the stage track in the Tape Deck! 

Music by Maximilien Gabillard - Please give him some love if you loved his tracks as much as I did
Visual Effects: Retro Aesthetics by Dustyroom
